column3: but need to add function for sorting currencies against customer's wish-list. The minus of the app is that I cannot see all rates simultaneously
column4: only when clicking / choosing to each particular currency. You need to mention in description that this app supports landscape mode for tablets
column5: which many other modern apps do not.

column2: Great idea But it needs more currencies. Kind of incomplete without it. I'd be interested in NIS in particular.
